question: India's first floating elementary school has been started in which of the following states?
explanation: India's first floating elementary school has been started in Loktak Lake in Manipur. It is the largest freshwater lake in the country, has now become home to first of its kind Loktak floating elementary school. The school was recently inaugurated at Langolsabi Leikai of Champu Khangpok village in Manipur. It aims to provide education to drop outs students, who were rendered homeless due to the recent evacuation of phumdis.
